The air conditioners can operate in both cooling and heating modes, providing comfortable temperatures year-round. We offer free on-site surveys to find the best solution for you. We offer wall-mounted split, parapet and ceiling cassette systems. We provide warranty after every installation and you can also sign annual maintenance contracts with us. We work quickly and reliably in Szeged and the surrounding area.

MAINTENANCE.TITLE: Maintenance
MAINTENANCE.SUBTITLE: Professional maintenance for cooling and heating systems
MAINTENANCE.DESCRIPTION: Regular maintenance ensures optimal operation and long lifespan of your air conditioning system, whether it operates in cooling or heating mode. It is recommended to have the system inspected by a professional at least once a year. Our services include cleaning heat exchangers, checking refrigerant levels, replacing filters and calibrating electronics. With our maintenance contracts, you can ensure continuous operation of your system at favorable prices.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Experience

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently asked questions about air conditioning installations
FAQ.DESCRIPTION: We collected the most common questions and answers so you can quickly find the ideal solution for you.

INSTALL_TIME.QUESTION: How long does an air conditioning installation take in Szeged?
INSTALL_TIME.ANSWER: A complete air conditioning installation in Szeged usually takes one day from the on-site survey to the test run, so you can enjoy quiet and efficient cooling right away.

MAINTENANCE.QUESTION: What maintenance does an air conditioning system need?
MAINTENANCE.ANSWER: Have your air conditioning system checked at least once a year: clean the heat exchangers, verify the refrigerant level, and calibrate the electronics to avoid faults and reduce energy use.

PANEL.QUESTION: How do I choose an air conditioner for a Szeged apartment block?
PANEL.ANSWER: For Szeged panel apartments, accurate capacity, low indoor noise, and safe condensate drainage are essential. Our on-site survey helps you pick the ideal unit.

PERMITS.QUESTION: Do I need permits for AC installation in Szeged?
PERMITS.ANSWER: In condominiums you should ask the building manager for approval, while in detached houses notifying neighbors is recommended. Licensed technicians handle the entire air conditioning installation.

PRICE.QUESTION: How much does an air conditioning installation cost in Szeged?
PRICE.ANSWER: The price of an air conditioning installation in Szeged depends on the chosen type, capacity, and complexity of the work. After a free on-site survey, we provide a detailed, personalized quote that includes material costs and labor.

ENERGY.QUESTION: How energy-efficient is a modern air conditioning system?
ENERGY.ANSWER: Today's air conditioning systems are A+++ energy rated, which can mean 40-50% lower energy consumption compared to older systems. We calculate the exact payback period during the on-site survey.

HEATING.QUESTION: Can I use my air conditioning for heating in winter?
HEATING.ANSWER: Yes, most modern air conditioning units use heat pump technology, so they can efficiently heat in winter as well. Heat pump systems operate stably down to -15°C, making them usable year-round.

MULTI_SPLIT.QUESTION: What's the difference between split and multi-split air conditioning?
MULTI_SPLIT.ANSWER: A split air conditioning system consists of one indoor and one outdoor unit, while a multi-split system connects multiple indoor units to one outdoor unit. Multi-split is ideal for cooling or heating multiple rooms and is a more cost-effective solution.

SERVICE.QUESTION: What should I do if my air conditioning system breaks down?
SERVICE.ANSWER: If you have a problem with your air conditioning system, contact us by phone or email. We provide quick troubleshooting and, if necessary, come to the site immediately. We also handle all service work.

SURVEY.QUESTION: Is the on-site survey free in Szeged?
SURVEY.ANSWER: Yes, the on-site survey is completely free in Szeged and the surrounding area. During the survey, we inspect the rooms, calculate the required capacity, and prepare a personalized quote for the optimal air conditioning system for you.
